S1.name: Strike of Flagbearer
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a flag, with a 75% chance to silence for 1 turn. If the enemy is silenced after the attack, decreases Combat Readiness by 25%.

S2.name: Target Lock
S2.description: After dispelling all buffs from a single enemy, has a 100% chance to inflict Target for 2 turns, and all allies except the caster attack the enemy with a basic skill. Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 30%.

S3.name: Flag of Victory
S3.description: Dispels two buffs from all enemies before a 100% chance to inflict Fear for 2 turns and decrease Combat Readiness by 20%. Grants increased Speed to all allies for 2 turns. At the start of the first battle, grants increased Evasion to the caster for 2 turns.

S1.name: Reaper's Scythe
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with Sigurd Scythe, before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 20%. When used on the caster's turn, activates Final Deliverance as an extra attack. Final Deliverance: Attacks all enemies, before granting stealth to the caster for 1 turn and decreasing skill cooldowns by 2 turns.

S2.name: Death's Dominion
S2.description: Enemy Heroes cannot revive and cannot be granted immortality. When attacking, penetrates the target's Defense by 85%, and cannot trigger a critical hit or a heavy blow.

S3.name: Inescapable Demise
S3.description: After granting increased Attack to the caster for 3 turns, attacks the enemy by releasing the force of the netherworld. When the target is a Hero, ignores damage share. Begins the first battle with a full skill cooldown count.

S1.name: Ambush
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with bloodied wings, and increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 15%. When used on the caster's turn, has a 35% chance to activate Might as an extra effect. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Blood Banquet
S2.description: At the start of the turn, curses the enemy with the highest Attack for 1 turn. When the ally in the back row except for the caster receives lethal damage, consumes 30% of the caster's current Health, dispelling all debuffs from the target, before granting immortality and vampirism for 1 turn.

S3.name: Scarlet Garden
S3.description: After dispelling all buffs from the enemy, attacks with a field of bloody thorns. Increases Effectiveness of this attack by 50% and damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Magic Design
S1.description: Attacks with a staff, with a 50% chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns.

S2.name: Rapid Cure
S2.description: Recovers an ally's Health and grants a barrier for 1 turn, before decreasing skill cooldown by 1 turn. Amount recovered and barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Max Health.

S3.name: Curing Prayer
S3.description: Dispels debuffs from all allies before healing them. Healing increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Ankle Cut
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a sword, increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 20%.

S2.name: Blade Gust
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with a blade gust, with an 80% chance to make them unable to be buffed for 2 turns. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases with fewer enemies.

S3.name: Lightning Bolt
S3.description: Attacks the enemy repeatedly, granting Weakness Shared to the caster for 2 turns. A critical hit has a 100% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

S1.name: Mana Release
S1.description: Attacks with the power of a magical tome, with a 35% chance to stun for 1 turn.

S2.name: Heroism
S2.description: Combat Readiness increases by 12% every time an ally except for the caster is attacked.

S3.name: Mana Seal
S3.description: Deals huge damage to all enemies with a sealing spell, with a 170% chance to dispel one buff, before a 170% chance to increase skill cooldowns by 1 turn.

S1.name: X-Slash
S1.description: Attacks with a sword, dealing damage proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Command Strike
S2.description: Attacks the enemy repeatedly, before triggering a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.

S3.name: Purifying Flame
S3.description: Strongly attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, before recovering the caster's Health and increasing Defense of all allies for 2 turns. Amount recovered and damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Silent Fire
S1.description: Silently shoots the enemy, with a 75% chance to decrease Defense for 1 turn.

S2.name: Maneuver Support
S2.description: At the end of the turn, increases Combat Readiness of the ally except for the caster with the highest Attack by 20%.

S3.name: Firepower Cube
S3.description: Throws a firepower cube to attack all enemies, before healing all allies and granting increased Attack and Speed for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.
